4307680.name: Ricochet
4307680.description:
In this short roguelike high score chaser dive into a hand-drawn arcade style experience built around experimentation and unique item combinations, mix them in creative ways and optimise your build to chase the ultimate high score.

Each stage challenges you to surpass a target score by launching your projectile into a library of magical tomes, each with unique effects that can combine and interact with the modifiers you’ve purchased in the shop.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
